vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate is applicable for the supply of restaurant and catering services, incl. the delivery of prepared or uncooked food and home delivery of food; this does not apply to restaurant and catering services, which consist in the supply of beer, wine and spirits, incl. in the cases of ancillary supply (where the principal supply is accompanied by another supply and the payment is determined as a total).The reduced rate is applicable on a temporary basis – until 31 December 2024.
